### T8493-230093 Rotor Brake Quill for the Bell 412 Aircraft Fleet

**Reference Number:** WS4450127304-Doc4467366598
**Solicitation Number:** WS4450127304
**Publication Date:** February 29, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 20, 2024 at 14:00 EDT

**About the Tender:**

This solicitation aims to acquire a rotor brake quill for the Bell 412 Aircraft Fleet for Transport Canada (TC) and the Air Services Directorate (ASD). A Request for Proposal (RFP) will be issued for this requirement with the CanadaBuys Standard Instructions and General Conditions. Qualified Supply Arrangement holders for procurement of T8493-140035 series for the Bell 412 Aircraft Fleet are eligible to bid.

### Amendments

Please note that the closing time for bids has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 14:00 EDT on March 20, 2024. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

### Tender Requirements

* **UNSPSC Code:** 25201601 - Aircraft digital altitude control systems
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criteria for this tender are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contracting Entity and End User Entity

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of Transport (TC)
